Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 5 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Fork, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 3 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Tail Spine, Ranged Weapon Attack, Range: 20/80ft, Average Damage: 4 Piercing plus 3 Fire

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Spined Devil makes 2 attacks, one with its Bite and one with its Fork, or two with its Tail Spines

Abilities.Ability 1: Devil's Sight, Magical darkness doesn't impede the Devil's darkvision
Abilities.Ability 2: Flyby, The Spined Devil doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach
Abilities.Ability 3: Limited Spines, The Spined Devil has 12 tail spines.  Used spines regrow by the time the Devil finishes a long rest
Abilities.Ability 4: Magic Resistance, The Devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects

Damage Resistances.Damage 2: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons
